data.name: YouRiding - Surfing and Bodyboarding Game
data.detailed_description:
YouRiding is a realistic surfing and bodyboarding game taking you to the best waves in the world.

Since 2007, YouRiding has been the reference in surfing and bodyboarding games with over 3 million players worldwide.

If you played YouRiding IV on browser or YouRiding The Journey on mobile, you are going to love our new game!

This game is currently available in Early Access with the current features:
  • Possibility to choose Surfing or Bodyboarding
  • More than 10 maneuvers in each sport
  • Freeride mode: single player at official spots and fight for the top spot in the ranking
  • Multiplayer mode: compete against other players in 16 players brackets
  • Community mode: play in Freeride on waves created by the community
  • Wave editor: create your own waves and share them to the community
  • Controller support: use your game controller during gameplay
  • Settings: configure the key bindings and other options

Join our Discord server to give us your feedback and tell us which features you would like to see in the next update!

Never Stop Riding!

data.short_description: A realistic surfing and bodyboarding game. Play for the top spot of the ranking at real spots like Kirra in Australia or Supertubes in Portugal, create your own waves and share them to the community, or play against other players in 16 surfers bracket competitions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.3, or later
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB of RAM minimum and GLSL 1.2 support
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.3, or later
  • Processor: Quad-core recommended
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card (AMD): Radeon R9 M290 | Video Card (NVIDIA): GeForce GTX 775M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
